message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. I think this is a fair starting point, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1050000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1000000, but that's as high as I can go. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1000000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer $1075000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1025000, but that's my final offer. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $1025000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $1075000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1025000 and $1075000. I'll offer $1050000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you've made a final offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1050000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $1055000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.

I'm disappointed that we couldn't come to an agreement, Alice. I've already made several concessions, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think it's time to walk away. I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1500000.
